usage: arcyd arcyd-status-html [-h] [--reset-file NAME] [--pause-file NAME]
                               REPORTFILE URL

Render arcyd status file as meaningful html to present to users.

positional arguments:
  REPORTFILE         path to the file to render
  URL                base url to construct links from

optional arguments:
  -h, --help         show this help message and exit
  --reset-file NAME  filename to watch for, will reset operations if the file
                     is detected and remove the file.
  --pause-file NAME  filename to watch for, will pause operations while the
                     file is detected.
